page.title: 02Attitudes Survey
page.content: {The Questionnaire.}We were each given a number of topics to choose from and formulate 1 question. We took a vote on each question and decided if it should be included in the questionnaire. {The Sample. The population of the area is 500. We thought a sample of 50 would be enough . We split the sample into 6, males aged 15_22, 23_45, 46+, (m1,m2,m3) and females(f1,f2,f3). 52 people took part and they were split:_ m1_8 m2_10 m3_7 f1_6 f2_11 f3_10. 1. I asked "Would you rather live in the country"? {Yes_98% No_2% Don't know_0% Stuart. 2. We asked "Do you think there should be people coming around about health like a visiting doctor every week"? {Yes_23% No_62% Don't know_15% Clare& We noted mothers(m2) said 45% {Diane Yes while fathers(f2) said 90% No.
